synos.tran: [纺]辅助的，[管理]助理的；有帮助的

remMethod.val: as(表加强) + sist(站) + ant(表人) → 站在你这一边的人 → 助手

words.tran: 帮助；助攻；vi. 参加；出席；vt. 帮助；促进

trans.tranOther: Assistant is used in front of titles or jobs to indicate a slightly lower rank. For example, an assistant director is one rank lower than a director in an organization.

trans.tranCn: 助手， 助教； 辅助物
trans.tranOther: someone who helps someone else in their work, especially by doing the less important jobs
